title.rendered: Swedish Biofuels enters into alliance with KBR

content.rendered:
Swedish Biofuels, a pioneer engineering company active within the field of biofuels and in particular sustainable aviation fuels, has entered into a global alliance agreement with KBR for the sub-licensing of Swedish Biofuels technology to KBR customers.

KBR is a multinational licensor and provider of science, technology and engineering solutions to governments and companies around the world. KBR is listed on the New York Stock Exchange.

As part of the alliance, Swedish Biofuels will license its cutting-edge technology to KBR, who in turn will sell licences to customers. The technology is unique as the output is ready-to-use real jet fuel as opposed to a blend component, and the technology allows for a wide variety of feedstock.

Mannheimer Swartling advised Swedish Biofuels throughout the negotiations.
